title: World War Z
overview: World War Z follows Gerry Lane, a former UN investigator, as he embarks on a global mission to find a solution to a devastating zombie pandemic that threatens humanity's survival. Racing against time, Lane uncovers clues across different countries in a desperate effort to stop the rapidly spreading virus.
